title: Music of the masters: 'Jesu, joy of man's desiring' Bach
brief_description: Prayerful lyricism of this Bach piece celebrated in H. Dexter’s sensitive arrangement for chamber trio (David Martin - violin; Barnard Richards - cello; Marie Goosens - harp). Delicate graceful gestures of the players are an apt counterpoint to the beauty of the music.
